headline: Wabtec Completes the Purchase of Inspection Technologies Division
summary: The addition of Inspection Technologies is likely to boost WAB's earnings, revenues, and operational performance, along with enhancing its product portfolio.

headline: Wabtec Announces Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Date
summary: PITTSBURGH, July 02, 2025--Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB) announced it will report 2025 second quarter results before the U.S. financial markets open on July 24, 2025. The company will conduct a conference call to discuss those results with analysts and investors at 8:30 a.m. ET the same day. To listen to the call via webcast, visit Wabtec’s website at www.WabtecCorp.com and click on "Events & Presentations" in the "Investor Relations" section. An audio replay of the call will be available by ca

headline: Wabtec Finalizes Acquisition of Evident's Inspection Technologies Division
summary: PITTSBURGH - Wabtec Corporation announced today that it completed the acquisition of Evident's Inspection Technologies division , formerly part of the Scientific Solutions Division of Olympus...
